mapper.insert: insert into morder (order_id, member_id, order_date, total_price, discount_price, state, request, zip_code, address1, address2, tel, rec_name, coupon_id) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{memberId}, sysdate, #{totalPrice}, #{discountPrice}, 1, #{request}, #{zipCode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{tel}, #{recName}, #{couponId})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, o.total_price, od.product_name, od.psize, od.amount, od.delivery_state FROM morder o, order_detail od WHERE o.member_id=#{value} AND o.order_id = od. order_id ORDER BY order_date DESC
